name: Muscle Car Parking Simulator Game
description:
Simple nice muscle car simulator parking game
Real 3D parking game with nice muscle car and real beautiful model city
Nice 3D muscle car parking and car racing, rally game to the parking spot
How fast your will drive and parking your car complete all 8 levels well ??
Test your driving and parking skills in this new and exciting 3D muscle car parking game!
A UNIQUE DRIVING EXPERIENCE WITH GORGEOUS 3D GRAPHICS
Your goal in this game is to park in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles.
There is a time limit to keep you on your toes.
If you have never driven a muscle car or bus before, then this game will give you that unique experience of driving a large vehicle.
It's very different experience from driving a sports car or a compact car like you may have experienced in racing games such as many sports car racing games ever
Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit!
muscle car simulator parking game 3D features:
- 8 Exciting levels!
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Unique muscle car driving experience!
- Beautiful 3D army muscle car model!
How to play muscle car simulator parking game
- Left right steering buttons to control driving your sports muscle car
- Driving you sports muscle car to the parking spot
this is video of muscle car simulator parking game
